alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Livingston and southern Tangipahoa Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ponchatoula, or over Hammond, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Ponchatoula, Amite City, Independence, Albany, Springfield, Natalbany, Robert, Killian and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 30 and 52. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 19 and 45. Locally heavy rain will move into the area quickly dropping 1 to 2 inches of rain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston
